lines.text: Right, What time do you want me to pick you up?
Mr. Donahue, Do you have a problem with your hearing? You seem to repeat everything I say.
30? Half of the day be gone. I thought you want to poke around tomorrow.
Poke Around? Explore! We leave right after Brunch.
Hey guys! Do you think this is a good idea?
Of course it is. If I was 17 years of age I have a golden ring in my belly button. I never go to sleep and I stay up all night
Yeah, I keeping my postcards forever, It's too bad you didn't mail some to yourself to yourself so you can have pictures of your vacation.
It took me a cab ride to Canada to remind me that the most important things in life are friends and family.
